POLICIES.TITLE: Cookie Policy
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_1: This Cookie Policy is an integral part of the Legal Notice and Privacy Policy of the website www.tspnegocios.com (hereinafter referred to as 'the Website'), which is owned by TSP Negocios. (hereinafter referred to as 'TSP Negocios') with its registered office at avenue Carlos Alberto Izaguirre Nro. 216 Independencia Lima. TSP Negocios is responsible for the cookies and the processing of personal data obtained through both its own and third-party cookies used on this Website.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_2: The Website uses third-party analytical cookies, specifically Google Analytics, to analyze user activity and compile statistics for the purpose of improving the Website.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_3: You can accept all cookies, reject them, or configure your preferences in the cookie settings panel. At any time, you can revoke your consent or change your cookie preferences by accessing the settings panel again. Additionally, you can prevent the download of cookies or delete those that have been installed by adjusting the settings in your browser, thus preventing the storage of cookies on your device. It is very important that you read and understand this cookie policy.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_4: We inform you of the possibility that rejecting or disabling cookies may affect or limit your browsing experience or the services provided on this Website.

WHAT_IS.TITLE: What Are Cookies?
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_1: Cookies are small alphanumeric identifiers containing information that is installed on the user's device. They are downloaded to the user's web browser when a website is visited and serve primarily to recognize the user's device upon each subsequent visit to the Website. The main purpose of cookies is to improve website quality and offer better usage.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_2: Cookies are small text files that are stored on the computer's hard drive and help to identify the user when they reconnect to the website. Their aim is to record the user's visit and save certain information. Their use is common and helps the website function more efficiently, providing greater personalization and analyzing user behavior.

TYPES.TITLE: Types of Cookies
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1_TITLE: 1. According to the entity that manages them:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1: First-party cookies are installed on the user's terminal from the domain managed by the website owner, while third-party cookies are installed from a domain managed by entities other than the website owner.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2_TITLE: 2. Depending on the duration of their activation:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2: Session cookies collect and store data while the user accesses a website and are deleted once the session ends. Persistent cookies remain on the user's terminal for a predefined period by the cookie manager or until they are deleted by the user.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_3: These cookies allow the user to navigate a website and use its various options or services. They are necessary for the operation of the site and cannot be rejected.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_4: These cookies remember user preferences for tools found on the website, so you don't have to reconfigure the service each time you visit. Examples include volume settings for video or sound players and video transmission speeds compatible with your browser. Users may disable these cookies, but this may impact the proper functioning of the website's services.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_5: These cookies allow the monitoring and analysis of user behavior on the website to collect statistical data and improve the site's functionality. Such cookies are generated by an external provider every time a user visits a website.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_6: These cookies collect information about the display duration or frequency of advertising positions, interaction with them, or user browsing patterns and behavior. They help to form an advertising interest profile and allow the delivery of advertisements tailored to the user's interests.

BLOCK.TITLE: Reject, Configure, Disable, or Block Cookies:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_1: Through the initial banner or cookie settings panel, which is always active and accessible, users have the option to accept or reject cookies and configure their preferences for cookies that require their consent.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_2: Users may revoke their initial consent or modify their preferences at any time by accessing the cookie settings panel.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_3: Moreover, users can block or delete cookies installed on their computer by configuring their browser options.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_4: Different browsers can be set to notify users of the receipt of cookies and, if desired, prevent their installation. Users can also check which cookies are installed and their expiration period, and delete them if necessary. Information on how to do this in relation to the most common browsers can be found at the following links:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_6: For more information on managing cookies in Internet Explorer:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_7: For more information on managing cookies in Mozilla Firefox:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_8: For more information on managing cookies in Safari:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_9: For more information on managing cookies in Opera:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_10: To stop being tracked by Google Analytics, visit:

MORE_INFO.TITLE: To Learn More About Cookies
MORE_INFO.DESCRIPTION_1: You can learn more about online behavioral advertising and online privacy at the following link:

THIRD_PARTY.TITLE: Third Parties and International Transfers
THIRD_PARTY.DESCRIPTION: You can find information about the processing carried out by third parties and any potential data transfers to other countries by these third parties in the links provided in this cookie policy. Any applicable mechanisms for the regularization of international transfers, if they exist, will be detailed by these third parties.

UPDATES.TITLE: Updates and Changes to the Cookie Policy
UPDATES.DESCRIPTION: UBIQ may modify this Cookie Policy based on legislative requirements, regulatory changes, or with the aim of adapting the policy to instructions issued by the Spanish Data Protection Agency and the European Data Protection Committee. Therefore, users are advised to periodically visit this page. Significant changes to this policy will be communicated on the Website.

ACCESS_AND_USE.TITLE: Conditions of Access and Use
ACCESS_AND_USE.DESCRIPTION_1: Access, navigation, and use of the website www.tspnegocios.com imply the express and unreserved acceptance of all the terms of the conditions of use included in this Legal Notice. Compliance is required for anyone who accesses, navigates, or uses the Website. If the User does not agree with all or part of the conditions of use as stated, they must refrain from accessing, navigating, or using the Website.

Users of the Website may contact TSP-Negocios by sending an email to: soportetsp22@gmail.com

PURPOSE_AND_CONTENT_WEBSITE.DESCRIPTION_1: This Website aims to inform Users about the services offered by TSP-Negocios related to businesses and to offer its products such as point-of-sale systems and business control systems. Access to the information on the Website does not imply or constitute any contractual relationship between the User and TSP-Negocios.
PURPOSE_AND_CONTENT_WEBSITE.DESCRIPTION_2: TSP-Negocios makes every effort to ensure that all information available on the Website is complete and up-to-date, periodically reviewing the Website's content. However, the User acknowledges and accepts that all information available on the Website is offered solely for informational purposes and that TSP-Negocios does not guarantee the accuracy, suitability, or completeness of the information contained on the Website. The User is solely responsible for the use they make of the information contained on the Website.

TERMS_OF_USE.TITLE: Terms of Use
TERMS_OF_USE.DESCRIPTION_1: These general terms of use regulate access and navigation on the Website, whose access and use are free and do not require prior registration of Users.
TERMS_OF_USE.DESCRIPTION_2: Access, use, or navigation on the Website grants the condition of User and implies knowledge, acceptance, and submission to the legal warnings and terms of use included in this Legal Notice in the version published at the time the User accesses the Website. The User accepts that the use of the Website takes place under their sole and exclusive responsibility. It is recommended that the User read this Legal Notice each time they access the Website.
TERMS_OF_USE.DESCRIPTION_3: TSP-Negocios reserves, without prior notice and at any time, the right to interrupt, temporarily suspend, deactivate, and/or cancel access to the Website or any of its integrated elements.

USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.TITLE: Use of the Website and Responsibility

By accessing, they accept and commit to using the Website, its contents, and services in accordance with the Law, this Legal Notice, good customs, and public order, and must respond to TSP-Negocios or third parties for any damage that may result from non-compliance with these obligations.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_2: Do not destroy, alter, disable, or damage the data or software or electronic documents of the Website.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_3: Do not obstruct other Users' access to the Website.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_4: Do not introduce viruses or any other device that causes or may cause an alteration in TSP-Negocios' systems.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_6: Do not distribute, share, sublicense, lend, lease, or make the Website available to third parties.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_7: Do not reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Website Software or attempt to obtain its source code.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_8: Do not store, introduce, or disseminate on or from the Website defamatory, injurious, obscene, threatening, xenophobic information or material that incites violence, discrimination based on race, sex, ideology, religion, violates morality, public order, fundamental rights, public freedoms, honor, privacy, or the image of third parties, and in general that violates current regulations.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_9: The User is solely and exclusively responsible for accessing the Website and using the information and data contained.
USE_OF_WEBSITE_AND_RESPONSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION_10: TSP-Negocios will not be liable for any consequences, damages, or harm arising from the User's access or use of the Website and its content. TSP-Negocios, as the owner of the Website, is exempt from any liability that may arise from the User's actions. Thus, the User is solely responsible for any claim initiated by third parties against TSP-Negocios for the User's access or use of the Website.

DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.TITLE: Disclaimer of Liability
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_1: TSP-Negocios makes every effort to ensure that the use of the Website is carried out under the best conditions and to provide updated information. However, TSP-Negocios does not guarantee the absence of errors or omissions in the Website's content, nor does it guarantee uninterrupted access to the Website, being authorized to temporarily suspend access to the Website without prior notice.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_2: · Any failure or interruption of communication, lack of availability, timeliness, maintenance, and effective operation of the Website and/or its services or content.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_3: · Non-compliance with Users' expectations regarding the Website or the server that provides it.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_4: · The invulnerability of the Website and/or the invulnerability of the security measures adopted on it.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_5: · The content, services, errors, or omissions that the Website's content or the links or hyperlinks that may be enabled may have.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_6: · The existence of viruses or harmful programs in the content that may cause alterations in the computer system, electronic documents, or files stored by Users.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_7: · Telephone or network failures caused by reasons beyond the control of the Website owner.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_8: · Delays or blockages in the operational functioning of the system caused by deficiencies or overloads in telephone lines or the Internet.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_9: · Unauthorized intrusions beyond the control of the Website owner, such as unauthorized access, copying, alteration, or deletion of information and data carried out by third parties on the Website.
DISCLAIMER_OF_LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION_10: TSP-Negocios employs all necessary technical resources to reduce such risks. However, Users are informed that such risks exist and that TSP-Negocios is not responsible for any damages that may occur.

INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.TITLE: Intellectual and Industrial Property
INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION_1: The content of the Website is governed by Peruvian laws and is protected by national and international legislation on Intellectual and Industrial Property.
INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION_2: The Intellectual and Industrial Property Rights over all the information contained on this Website, including but not limited to trademarks, trade names, graphic design, drawings, logos, images, indexes, texts, audios, videos, software, design, and identifying signs, as well as their source codes, navigation structure, databases, and all elements contained therein, are protected by copyright and intellectual and industrial property rights of TSP-Negocios or third parties.
INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION_3: In no case shall access and use of the Website by Users be considered as a license of use or right to any asset of TSP-Negocios or its legitimate authors, and therefore shall not imply a transfer, assignment, or any type of waiver of Intellectual or Industrial Property rights.
INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION_4: Unless expressly authorized by TSP-Negocios or the third-party rights holders, any reproduction, copying, conversion, distribution, modification, deletion, or transformation, publication, commercialization, use of reverse engineering techniques, or any other means to obtain the source code and any other activity that may be carried out with the data and information contained on the Website, as well as its design and the selection and presentation model, is prohibited. Users use the information they can access through the Website exclusively for personal purposes and never for commercial or business purposes.
INTELLECTUAL_AND_INDUSTRIAL_PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION_5: Unauthorized use of the information contained on the Website, its modification or deletion of data, as well as the violation of Intellectual or Industrial Property Rights of TSP-Negocios or third parties, will result in the legally established responsibilities, reserving TSP-Negocios the possibility of exercising the judicial actions that may be appropriate against Users who violate or infringe intellectual or industrial property rights.

THIRD_PARTY_LINKS.TITLE: Third-Party Links
THIRD_PARTY_LINKS.DESCRIPTION_1: This Website may contain links to other websites managed by third-party owners. Such domains have their own Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Cookie Policy. Therefore, we recommend that Users read them before registering and opening an account on such domains.
THIRD_PARTY_LINKS.DESCRIPTION_2: TSP-Negocios reserves the right to unilaterally and at any time remove the links that appear on this Website.

SOCIAL_NETWORKS.TITLE: Social Networks
SOCIAL_NETWORKS.DESCRIPTION_1: This Website may contain links that allow Users to access different social networks owned and/or managed by third parties (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, YouTube). These links on the Website are solely intended to facilitate Users' access to social networks to inform them about events organized by TSP-Negocios.
SOCIAL_NETWORKS.DESCRIPTION_2: The activation and use of these applications may involve the identification and authentication of the User (login/password) on the corresponding platforms, completely external to the Website and beyond the control of TSP-Negocios. By accessing such external networks, the User enters an environment not controlled by TSP-Negocios, so it will not assume any responsibility for the security configuration of such environments. These social networks and platforms have their own privacy policies and cookie processing policies. In this regard, all information and personal data that the User provides to these platforms will be under their sole and exclusive responsibility.

DATA_PROTECTION.TITLE: Personal Data Protection
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_1: TSP-Negocios, as the owner of the Website, informs Users that it is responsible for the processing of personal data requested and provided during the use of the Website.
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_2: In accordance with the applicable legislation on data protection, TSP-Negocios respects Users' privacy and the confidentiality and security of personal data, adopting the necessary technical and organizational measures to prevent the loss, misuse, alteration, unauthorized access, and theft of personal data provided, considering the state of technology, the nature of the data, and the risks to which they are exposed.
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_3: The personal data of Website Users will only be obtained to be processed when they are adequate, relevant, and not excessive in relation to the scope and purposes determined, explicit, consented, and/or legitimate for which they have been collected. When personal data is collected through the Website, Users will be clearly and unequivocally informed in advance.
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_4: Users must visit TSP-Negocios' Privacy Policy on this same Website, where they will find detailed information regarding the protection of personal data.

SITE_UPDATE.TITLE: Website Update
SITE_UPDATE.DESCRIPTION_1: To improve the service for the benefit of Users, TSP-Negocios S.A.C. reserves the right to update, modify, or delete without prior notice the presentation and configuration of the Website, the content and information contained therein, as well as modify the Terms of Use, which will take effect from the moment of their publication on the Website and will be applicable from that date.

WEB_INTEROPERABILITY_AND_FUNCTIONALITY.TITLE: Website Compatibility and Functionality
WEB_INTEROPERABILITY_AND_FUNCTIONALITY.DESCRIPTION_1: The Website runs on the Safari, Firefox, Internet Explorer, and Chrome platforms updated in 2019. It is especially optimized for Chrome.

INTEGRITY.TITLE: Integrity
INTEGRITY.DESCRIPTION_1: If any of the terms of use of this Legal Notice are annulled or deemed invalid, the remaining terms will not be affected and will continue to be fully valid and enforceable.

APPLICABLE_LEGISLATION_AND_JURISDICTION.TITLE: Applicable Legislation and Jurisdiction
APPLICABLE_LEGISLATION_AND_JURISDICTION.DESCRIPTION_1: Any issue or controversy that may arise regarding the application of this Legal Notice between the User and TSP-Negocios is governed by the applicable Peruvian regulations in force. And whenever the applicable regulations allow the parties to submit to a specific jurisdiction, the User expressly waives the jurisdiction that may correspond to them and submits to the Courts and Tribunals of Lima for the resolution of the controversy.

POLICY.TITLE: Política de privacidad
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_1: Nos complace que visite la web oficial de PREMIOS ESLAND www.premiosesland.com (en adelante, Sitio Web) y agradecemos su interés.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_2: UBIQ S.L.U (en adelante, UBIQ) tiene el firme compromiso de cumplir con la legislación vigente en materia de protección de datos personales para garantizar la privacidad, el secreto y la seguridad de los datos personales de los Usuarios aplicando medidas técnicas y organizativas apropiadas al efecto.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_3: La presente Política de Privacidad tiene por objeto informar a los Usuarios sobre el tratamiento que UBIQ hace de los datos personales que el Usuario facilite al acceder, navegar y utilizar los servicios que se ofrecen en el Sitio Web, así como de las medidas de seguridad adoptadas, del ejercicio de los derechos de los Usuarios y de la forma de contacto.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_4: Los datos personales sólo serán obtenidos por UBIQ para su tratamiento, cuando sean adecuados, pertinentes y no excesivos en relación con el ámbito y las finalidades determinadas, explícitas y legítimas para las que se hayan obtenido.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_5: A continuación, cumplimiento con la normativa vigente en materia de protección de datos personales proporcionamos a los Usuarios la siguiente información:

RESPONSIBLE.TITLE: Responsable del tratamiento
RESPONSIBLE.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ S.L.U (en adelante, UBIQ) sociedad andorrana con NRT L-718097-X, con domicilio social en la calle Josep Viladomat, 4, Ed Sogas, 1-1 AD700 Escaldes Engordany (Andorra), inscrita en el Registro de Sociedades del Gobierno de Andorra con nº 23023, con correo electrónico [info@ubiq.ad], es la titular de la página Web www.premiosesland.com (en adelante, Sitio Web).
RESPONSIBLE.DESCRIPTION_2: Los Usuarios pueden contactar con el Responsable del Tratamiento a través de la siguiente dirección de correo electrónico: info@ubiq.ad

DEFINITIONS.TITLE: Definiciones
DEFINITIONS.DESCRIPTION: A los efectos de la presente Política, los siguientes términos tendrán el significado que se indica a continuación:
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_1: “Datos Personales”: toda información sobre una persona física identificada o identificable. Se considera persona física identificable toda persona cuya identidad pueda determinarse, directa o indirectamente, mediante un identificador.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_2: “Responsable del Tratamiento”: Persona física o jurídica, autoridad pública, servicio u otro organismo que, solo o junto con otros, determine los fines y medios del tratamiento de datos.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_3: “Encargado del Tratamiento”: Persona física o jurídica, autoridad pública, servicio u otro organismo que trate datos personales por cuenta del responsable del tratamiento.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_4: “Interesado-Usuario”: Toda persona física identificada o identificable cuyos datos personales sean objeto de tratamiento.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_5: “Tratamiento de datos”: Cualquier operación o conjunto de operaciones realizadas sobre Datos Personales o conjuntos de datos personales, ya sea por procedimientos automatizados o no, como la recogida, registro, organización, estructuración, conservación, adaptación o modificación, extracción, consulta, utilización, comunicación por transmisión, difusión o cualquier otra forma de habilitación de acceso, cotejo o interconexión, limitación, supresión o destrucción.

PURPOSE.TITLE: Finalidad del tratamiento
PURPOSE.DESCRIPTION_1: Gestionar las solicitudes de información recibidas a través de la función de “Contacto” de la Web. Gestionar las votaciones de los PREMIOS ESLAND realizadas por los Usuarios del Sitio Web (identificación, validación y recuento de votos). Fines estadísticos de participación y resultados de las votaciones en los PREMIOS ESLAND -para dar cumplimiento a esta finalidad los datos personales serán objeto de un proceso de anonimización-. Para poder participar como jurado en los PREMIOS ESLAND, los Usuarios deberán pulsar en “Identifícate y Vota” y serán redireccionados a la web de Twitch (www.twitch.tv) en la que deberán disponer de una cuenta abierta en dicha plataforma de streaming. Cuando el Usuario desde su cuenta pulse “Autorizar” estará manifestando que ha leído y que acepta la Política de Privacidad de www.premiosesland.com. A continuación, el Usuario podrá seleccionar sus preferencias de voto de entre las distintas categorías definidas por Streamers y contenidos siguiendo las indicaciones del Sitio Web y una vez seleccionados sus votos deberá pulsar en “Enviar Mis Votos”. Las votaciones y la identidad del Usuario se registrarán en la base de datos de UBIQ. La identidad del Usuario se registrará mediante un código hash -algoritmo matemático- (pseudonimizado).
PURPOSE.DESCRIPTION_2: Twitch Interactive, Inc. propietaria de www.twitch.tv actúa como proveedor de los servicios de validación y verificación de la identidad de los Usuarios que votan para evitar el fraude en el proceso de votación.

PERSONAL_DATA.TITLE: Categoría de datos personales
PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION_1: La categoría de datos que trata UBIQ en el Sitio Web, son:
PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2: Correo electrónico en función de Contacto. Datos identificativos: Identificación del Usuario mediante un código hash -algoritmo matemático-. UBIQ no accede a los datos de la cuenta que los Usuarios tienen en www.twitch.tv.

LEGITIMACY.TITLE: Base de legitimación
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_1: La base de legitimación para gestionar las comunicaciones que se reciban a través de la función “Contacto” es el interés legítimo de UBIQ.
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_2: La base de legitimación del tratamiento de los datos personales de los Usuarios que participan en los PREMIOS ESLAND es el consentimiento expreso otorgado al participar como jurado y el interés legítimo de UBIQ en la gestión de los eventos que organice y en la gestión de los PREMIOS ESLAND.
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_3: El Usuario podrá revocar el consentimiento en cualquier momento. No obstante, el tratamiento sobre los datos personales realizado con anterioridad a la revocación del consentimiento será lícito.

PRESERVATION.TITLE: Conservación de los datos
PRESERVATION.DESCRIPTION_1: Los datos se conservarán durante el plazo estrictamente necesario para dar cumplimiento a la finalidad para la que fueron recabados. No obstante, UBIQ podrá conservar los datos para su puesta a disposición de las autoridades competentes o para hacer frente a posibles reclamaciones, en cuyo caso los datos se conservarán bloqueados hasta la finalización de los plazos de prescripción, momento en que serán eliminados con las medidas de seguridad adecuadas.
PRESERVATION.DESCRIPTION_2: Finalizado el plazo de conservación, los datos personales podrán ser objeto de un proceso de anonimización para fines estadísticos de los PREMIOS ESLAND.

COMMUNICATION.TITLE: Comunicación de datos
COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ no cederá a terceros los datos facilitados por los Usuarios del Sitio Web, salvo consentimiento previo y expreso de éstos o sea necesario por imperativo legal (Administraciones públicas, Fuerzas y Cuerpos de Seguridad del Estado, Ministerio Fiscal, Agencia Española de Protección de Datos, etc).
COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION_2: UBIQ informa a los Usuarios que los datos personales podrán comunicarse a proveedores de UBIQ para poder atender a la gestión de los PREMIOS ESLAND, en cuyo caso, aquellos tendrán la condición de encargados del tratamiento siguiendo las instrucciones de UBIQ sobre el tratamiento de datos personales.

USER_RIGHTS.TITLE: Derechos de los usuarios
USER_RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ informa a los Usuarios que en referencia al tratamiento de sus datos personales pueden ejercer los siguientes derechos:
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_1: Derecho a revocar el consentimiento otorgado en cualquier momento.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_2: Derecho a obtener información sobre si UBIQ trata datos personales del Usuario.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_3: Derecho de acceso, rectificación, portabilidad y supresión de sus datos, y a la limitación u oposición al tratamiento.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_4: Derecho a no ser objeto de decisiones individuales automatizadas, incluyendo la elaboración de perfiles.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_5: Derecho a presentar una reclamación ante el Agencia Española de Protección de Datos (www.aepd.es), cuando el Usuario considere que UBIQ ha vulnerado sus derechos en el tratamiento de datos personales.
USER_RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION_2: Los Usuarios podrán ejercer sus derechos en cualquier momento y de forma gratuita dirigiéndose por escrito a UBIQ S.L.U. por correo postal a la dirección de calle Ganduxer, nº 129, C.P 08022 Barcelona o bien mediante correo electrónico a la dirección [……info@fan.content.com…….], en ambos casos deberá acompañarse copia del Documento Nacional de Identidad o documento equivalente que acredite su identidad.

THIRD_PARTY_DOMAIN_LINKS.TITLE: Enlaces de dominio de terceros
THIRD_PARTY_DOMAIN_LINKS.DESCRIPTION: Para poder participar como jurado los Usuarios serán redireccionados al dominio www.twitch.tv titularidad de un tercero -Twitch Interactive, Inc-. Dicho dominio dispone de sus propias Condiciones de Uso, Política de Privacidad y Política de Cookies. Por ello, recomendamos a los Usuarios que las consulten antes de su utilización.

SOCIALS.TITLE: Redes sociales
SOCIALS.DESCRIPTION_1: Este Sitio Web puede contener enlaces que permiten acceder a diferentes redes sociales pertenecientes y gestionadas por terceros (p.ej. Facebook, Instagram, YouTube). Estos enlaces en el Sitio Web tienen por único objeto facilitar a los Usuarios el acceso a redes sociales para informales sobre los eventos organizados por UBIQ.
SOCIALS.DESCRIPTION_2: La activación y uso de estas aplicaciones puede conllevar la identificación y autenticación del Usuario (login/contraseña) en las plataformas correspondientes, completamente externas al Sitio Web y fuera del control de UBIQ. Dichas redes sociales y plataformas disponen de sus propias políticas de privacidad y del tratamiento de las cookies. En este sentido, toda información y datos personales que el Usuario proporcione a estas plataformas será bajo su propia y exclusiva responsabilidad.

COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION_1: Este Sitio Web no utiliza cookies para recoger información de los Usuarios, únicamente se utilizan cookies propias, de sesión, con finalidad técnica - aquellas que permiten al Usuario la navegación segura a través del Sitio Web y la utilización de las distintas funciones y servicios que se ofrecen en el Sitio Web. Para una información más detallada acceda a la Política de Cookies.
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION_2: No obstante, este Sitio Web puede contener enlaces a sitios web de terceros con políticas de privacidad y de cookies ajenas a UBIQ y que el Usuario podrá decidir si acepta o rechaza cuando acceda a esos sitios web.

INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFERS.TITLE: Transferencias internacionales
INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFERS.DESCRIPTION: Los datos personales pueden alojarse en servidores ubicados fuera del Espacio Económico Europeo (Estados Unidos, Japón, Australia, Japón), al participar en los PREMIOS ESLAND consiente dicha transferencia de datos y se le informa que en éstas se garantiza la existencia de una Decisión de Adecuación del Comité Europeo de Protección de Datos o bien la adopción de medidas de garantía complementarias a fin de garantizar un nivel de adecuación de protección alineado con el Reglamento General de Protección de Datos de la Unión Europea.

MODIFICATIONS.TITLE: Modificaciones de la política de privacidad
MODIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: UBIQ se reserva el derecho a modificar esta Política de privacidad en función de exigencias legislativas, reglamentarias o con la finalidad de adaptar dicha política a las instrucciones dictadas por la Agencia Española de Protección de Datos y/o por el Comité Europeo de Protección de Datos, por ello se aconseja a los Usuarios que la visiten periódicamente. Cuando se produzcan cambios significativos en esta Política, éstos se publicarán en el Sitio Web.
MODIFICATIONS.LAST_UPDATE: Fecha de la última actualización: 12 del 12 de 2023.
